thread.section_title: LymphedemaProducts.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LymphedemaProducts.com | lymphedemaproducts.com
thread.title: Kimberly

author: Kimberly
title: Kimberly
text: The items I ordered were as described. I have had no issues with the products. I called LymphedemaProducts to check on the status of my order after not hearing anything once my order was placed. The gentleman on the phone was very helpful and had apologized for the lack of communication which as due to an upgrade with their system. The items did arrive as the person on the phone had stated to me. I have ordered from LymphedemaProducts before and have had nothing but success with them (products and customer service). I will continue to order from them as needed.
